00016 class AloneBillboardIcon : public tbe::scene::ParticlesEmiter
00017 {
00018 public:
00019 
00020     AloneBillboardIcon(PlayManager* playManager)
00021     : tbe::scene::ParticlesEmiter(playManager->parallelscene.particles),
00022     m_playManager(playManager)
00023     {
00024         SetBlendEq(ParticlesEmiter::MODULAR);
00025         SetDepthTest(true);
00026     }
00027 
00028     tbe::scene::Node* Clone()
00029     {
00030         return new AloneBillboardIcon(*this);
00031     }
00032 
00033     void SetupBullet(tbe::scene::Particle& p)
00034     {
00035         p.color(1, 1, 1, 0.5);
00036         p.life = 1.0f;
00037     }
00038 
00039     void Process()
00040     {
00041         const Player::Array& players = m_playManager->GetPlayers();
00042 
00043         scene::Particle* particles = BeginParticlesPosProcess();
00044 
00045         unsigned show = 0;
00046         for(unsigned i = 0; i < players.size(); i++)
00047             if(players[i] != m_playManager->GetUserPlayer()
00048                && !players[i]->IsKilled())
00049             {
00050                 particles[show].pos = players[i]->GetPos() + Vector3f(0, 1, 0);
00051                 show++;
00052             }
00053 
00054         SetDrawNumber(show);
00055 
00056         EndParticlesPosProcess();
00057     }
00058 
00059 protected:
00060     PlayManager* m_playManager;
00061 };
00062 
00063 PlayAloneManager::PlayAloneManager(AppManager* appManager) : PlayManager(appManager)
00064 {
00065     m_playersLabel = new AloneBillboardIcon(this);
00066     m_playersLabel->SetTexture(Texture(PARTICLE_PLAYER, true));
00067     m_playersLabel->Build();
00068     manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(m_playersLabel);
00069 }

00076 {
00077 public:

00080     {
00081         m_playManager = playManager;
00082     }
00083 
00084     bool OnTakeItems(Player* player, Item* item)
00085     {
00086         return false;
00087     }
00088 
00089     void AfterReborn(Player* player)
00090     {

00093

00095     PlayAloneManager* m_playManager;

00098 class AloneModeCheckUserPlayer : public Player::CheckMe
00099 {
00100 public:
00101 
00102     AloneModeCheckUserPlayer(PlayAloneManager* playManager)
00103     {
00104         m_playManager = playManager;
00105     }
00106 
00107     bool OnKilled(Player* player)
00108     {
00109         m_playManager->SetGameOver();
00110         return true;
00111     }
00112 
00113     bool OnTakeDammage(Player* player, Bullet* ammo)
00114     {
00115         ammo->SetDammage(ammo->GetDammage() / 2);
00116         return true;
00117     }
00118 
00119 private:
00120     PlayAloneManager* m_playManager;
00121 };

00123 void PlayAloneManager::ModSetupUser(Player* userPlayer)
00124 {
00125     userPlayer->AddCheckPoint(new AloneModeCheckUserPlayer(this));
00126 }
00127 
00128 void PlayAloneManager::ModSetupAi(Player* player)
00129 {
00130     m_playersLabel->SetNumber(m_players.size());
00131     m_playersLabel->Build();
00132 
00133     player->AttachController(new AloneModeAi(this));
00134     player->AddCheckPoint(new AloneModeCheckPlayers(this));
00135     player->SetLife(1);
00136 }

00138 void PlayAloneManager::ModUpdateStateText(std::ostringstream& ss)
00139 {
00140     using namespace gui;
00141 
00142     ss << "Score : " << m_userPlayer->GetScore() << " Point(s)" << endl;
00143 
00144     if(m_playTimeManager.startChrono > 0)
00145         ss << "Temps : " << m_playTimeManager.curChrono << "/" << m_playTimeManager.startChrono << endl;
00146     else
00147         ss << "Temps : Infinie" << endl;
00148 
00149     if(m_playSetting.winCond > 0)
00150         ss << "Objectif : " << m_playSetting.winCond << endl;
00151 }

00170 void PlayAloneManager::ModUpdateGameOverText(std::ostringstream& ss)
00171 {
00172     using namespace gui;
00173 
00174     if(m_playSetting.winCond > 0)
00175     {
00176         if(m_userPlayer->GetScore() >= m_playSetting.winCond)
00177             ss << "<< VOUS AVEZ GANGEZ !!! >>" << endl;
00178         else
00179             ss << "<< VOUS AVEZ PERDU !!! >>" << endl;
00180 
00181         ss << endl;
00182     }
00183 
00184     ss << "Carte : " << map.name << endl;
00185     ss << "Type : Alone" << endl;
00186 
00187     if(m_playTimeManager.startChrono > 0)
00188         ss << "Temps : " << m_playTimeManager.startChrono << endl;
00189     else
00190         ss << "Temps : " << "Infinie" << endl;
00191 
00192     ss << endl;
00193 
00194     ss << "[" << m_userPlayer->GetScore() << "] " << m_userPlayer->GetName() << endl;
00195 
00196     ss << endl;
00197 
00198     ss << "Espace pour continuer..." << endl;
